import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' //we get "match" as props, because with that we can get id from url and use it here. const ProductPage = ({match}) => { const product = products.find(p=>p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 value = {product.rating} ) } export default ProductPage
